caption:
If nothing changes, where will you be 5 years from now?

It’s a hard question—but an important one.

The good news?

One decision can be the catalyst for everything else.

I started my coaching practice over 6 years ago, and it started with one decision.

I decided to hand in my resignation.

This was no easy feat!

After all, I had worked with most of these people for over ten years. We found solutions together. We dined together. We knew each other’s families…how could I leave them?

Moreover, leaving the financial security of corporate life required a lot of faith, because there was no safety net.

If I failed, I would land right on my butt!

But what if I hadn’t decided to bet on myself? 💡

Where would I be five years later?

I can only speculate, but I think my speculations are close to accurate:

👉🏽I would have still been an Administrative Assistant. I would have missed out on partnering with some phenomenal people to help them achieve their incredible dreams, because I would have still been sitting behind a desk, booking lunch dates, screening phone calls, filing expense reports, and playing a bit character in someone else’s dream.

👉🏽I would have missed out on writing my first book and being featured in magazines and podcasts. No one would have had the chance to hear and apply my theories on: creating a lifestyle that fulfills you, the necessary steps to take before setting goals, or how to reimagine how you show up in this world.

👉🏽I would still be living the lifestyle that I help others escape. Chasing promotions that never come, fitting my life into someone else’s box, dimming my light so others would find me palatable, and showing up inauthentically to maintain some sense of safety.

That one decision helped me evolve in ways I never imagined!

Look, I can promise you this, if you don’t decide to do something different...

We'll be having the same conversation, five years from now.

However, one phone call could open up a world you never imagined.

Let’s talk about your vision and what’s standing in the way. Book a Jumpstart Your Success Strategy Session.

Link in my bio.

#futurefocused #coachingforleaders #intentionalgrowth #midlife
